page.title: 05SHOPPING IN UCKFIELD.
page.content: Uckfield shops range along the{High {Street}, a few spreading into{Church {Street and Framfield Road.}There is a small local parade on the Manor Park Estate. There is only one supermarket and because of this many people travel to {Crowborough}and{Lewes}for their main food shop,once a week.We do have a selection of specialized food businesses. We have a range of non food shops but no department store so people travel to{Eastbourne}and{Brighton}for large items.We do have a good selection of shoe retailers. Most people feel that the bypass will make Uckfield a nicer place to shop.Our Thursday open market will be replaced by a covered market soon and more shops are planned in the near future.
